text: @realDonaldTrump Oh sir, that's simple. That's because you're actually the worst president ever! You fail constantly, but now people are dying because of your screw-ups. No I'm not talking about your sons, but about how you have fumbled every step of the way in managing the Coronavirus outbreak!!

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
